original_text: He may go up the mountains and eat the food of idols. He might have sex with another man's wife.
korean_text: 산 위에서 제물을 먹거나 이웃의 아내를 더럽히거나

sentences.original_text: He may go up the mountains
and eat the food of idols
He might have sex with another man's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 사람의 아내와 성관계를 가질 수도 있다
